definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

pinyin: Shang4 hai3 Wai4 guo2 yu3 Da4 xue2

sentences.english: As a celebrated scholar living abroad, Ho Peng Yoke is devoted to the study of history of Chinese science and technology.
sentences.chinese: 何丙郁先生是海外研究中国科技史的一位著名学者。

sentences.english: His policy of overseas contacts was generally followed by his successors in Ming Dyn …
sentences.chinese: 明朝后代基本上沿用了太祖的海外交往政策。

sentences.english: Then, in 1567, the ban on overseas trade was lifted.
sentences.chinese: 此后，在1567年，海外贸易的禁令解除。

sentences.english: The author has also probed the historical role and meaning of the overseas Chinese school songs.
sentences.chinese: 作者也分析了海外学堂乐歌的历史作用和意义。

sentences.english: Luring [A7] students back from foreign campuses constitutes China's new class struggle[A8] .
sentences.chinese: 因此，吸引海外学生归囯成为了中囯新的阶级斗争。

sentences.english: Many are believed to have been trained in overseas terrorist camps.
sentences.chinese: 许多人被人曾在海外的恐怖分子营地接受过训练。

sentences.english: Since earlier this year, the game has been discussed by overseas-based human rights organizations.
sentences.chinese: 从今年年初开始，海外人权组织开始讨论这款游戏。

sentences.english: Most fruit is sent overseas by airfreight in order to save time.
sentences.chinese: 大部分运送到海外的水果都是用空运以节省时间。

sentences.english: Are there chances for employees to be transferred to the oversea brach of the company?
sentences.chinese: 雇员有机会到公司设的海外分部工作吗？

sentences.english: Will travel overseas affect eligibility under the new requirements?
sentences.chinese: 根据新的要求，海外旅行是否会影响入籍资格？

sentences.english: What was your overseas exchange experience like?
sentences.chinese: 可否分享海外交流经验？

sentences.english: Recruitment of overseas agents and distributors, detailed issues please contact us.
sentences.chinese: 诚招海外代理与经销商，详细事宜请联系我们。

sentences.english: This harbour teemed with oceangoing commerce.
sentences.chinese: 这一海港曾经有繁盛的海外贸易。

sentences.english: The heads of some of China's most vital state-owned companies, including oil giant CNOOC, also studied abroad.
sentences.chinese: 中国一些最重要的国有企业的负责人也曾在海外学习。

sentences.english: No examination centres will be set up in any overseas cities for the coming CRE.
sentences.chinese: 当局不会为是次考试在海外城市设立试场。

sentences.english: In fact, this is also home to many foreign investors intent concerns.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，这也是许多意图进行海外置地投资者的顾虑。

definition: Europe/abbr. for 歐羅巴洲|欧罗巴洲[Ou1 luo2 ba1 Zhou1]
all over the world/everywhere/in all parts of the world
